headline.main: Chicago Names Attorney to Lead Law Department Review
headline.print_headline: Chicago Names Attorney to Lead Law Department Review

docs.snippet: A former U.S. attorney will conduct an independent review of the Chicago law department's civil rights litigation division after a federal judge ruled that a city lawyer hid evidence in the fatal police shooting of a black man, officials said on S...
docs.lead_paragraph: A former U.S. attorney will conduct an independent review of the Chicago law department's civil rights litigation division after a federal judge ruled that a city lawyer hid evidence in the fatal police shooting of a black man, officials said on Sunday.

headline.main: Marseille Draw With Guingamp in Another Home Setback
headline.print_headline: Marseille Draw With Guingamp in Another Home Setback

docs.snippet: Olympique de Marseille's dismal home form continued on Sunday when they were held 0-0 in Ligue 1 by second-from-bottom En Avant Guingamp, their fourth league draw in a row....
docs.lead_paragraph: Olympique de Marseille's dismal home form continued on Sunday when they were held 0-0 in Ligue 1 by second-from-bottom En Avant Guingamp, their fourth league draw in a row.

headline.main: Villanova Women Hand No. 24 DePaul 1st Big East Loss, 64-60
headline.print_headline: Villanova Women Hand No. 24 DePaul 1st Big East Loss, 64-60

docs.snippet: Caroline Coyer scored 18 of her 25 points in the second half, Katherine Coyer made a free throw with 6.2 seconds left and Villanova beat No. 24 DePaul 64-60 on Sunday to knock off the lone unbeaten team in Big East play....
docs.lead_paragraph: Caroline Coyer scored 18 of her 25 points in the second half, Katherine Coyer made a free throw with 6.2 seconds left and Villanova beat No. 24 DePaul 64-60 on Sunday to knock off the lone unbeaten team in Big East play.

headline.main: No. 13 Texas A&M Women Pull Away From LSU 53-35
headline.print_headline: No. 13 Texas A&M Women Pull Away From LSU 53-35

docs.snippet: Courtney Walker scored 21 points and No. 13 Texas A&M took control in the second half to defeat LSU 53-35 on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Courtney Walker scored 21 points and No. 13 Texas A&M took control in the second half to defeat LSU 53-35 on Sunday.

headline.main: Alabama's Saban: Love Him or Hate Him, His Dynasty Stands
headline.print_headline: Alabama's Saban: Love Him or Hate Him, His Dynasty Stands

docs.snippet: To all those who think Nick Saban leads a joyless life, that all he cares about is winning football games, he'd like to set the record straight....
docs.lead_paragraph: To all those who think Nick Saban leads a joyless life, that all he cares about is winning football games, he'd like to set the record straight.

headline.main: Short-Handed No. 15 SMU Still Undefeated, Beats UCF 88-73
headline.print_headline: Short-Handed No. 15 SMU Still Undefeated, Beats UCF 88-73

docs.snippet: Short-handed No. 15 SMU can make a lot of 3-pointers and also put on quite a show with alley-oop passes that lead to rim-rattling dunks. Except those plays don't generally go hand-in-hand....
docs.lead_paragraph: Short-handed No. 15 SMU can make a lot of 3-pointers and also put on quite a show with alley-oop passes that lead to rim-rattling dunks. Except those plays don't generally go hand-in-hand.
